body:
Add the latest two releases of Catch2. In 2.3.0+, the include changed to a future-proof `<catch2/catch.hpp>` path which dependent projects will break upon.

In Spack mainline, `openPMD-api` is the only project that depends on Catch2. Dependencies have been updated accordingly in it: https://github.com/openPMD/openPMD-api/pull/367
title: Catch2: 2.3.0+
